title: Inventing David Geffen, with guest Rachael Harris!
description:
Rachael Harris joins Tig and Cheryl to talk about Hollywood mogul David Geffen, who smuggled drugs for David Crosby, dated Cher, and feuded with Neil Young! True Story has never been sillier, as Rachael identifies Cheryl as the "dramaturge" of the podcast, and teams up with Tig to derail her more than ever. *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
